basic.origin: The North Temperate Zone and Frigid Zone
basic.blooming: Flowering period May-June, fruiting period August-September

maintenance.soil: Soil with loose texture or soil with specific nutrients
maintenance.sunlight: Like sunshine, grows in sunny places, slight shade tolerance
maintenance.watering: Water thoroughly after soil surface dries, avoid saturated water
maintenance.fertilization: Need more fertilization, dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply 2-3 times monthly
maintenance.pruning: Remove aged tissues, dead and pest branches timely
